title: Unedited: Petersons' Times Interview
description:
To see why we accepted the interviews with Decca, you can view the invitation that we received by following this link: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/blog-posts/the-sunday-times-interview-request-and-my-response/

Here is the transcript of the interviews: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/blog-posts/sunday-times-unedited-interview-transcript/

Here are the full unedited audio recordings of the interviews my daughter @Mikhaila Peterson and I recently undertook with Decca Aitkenhead of the Times -https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/jordan-peterson-depression-drug-dependency-daughter-mikhaila-rehab-russia-0xtz2ph32

Here’s a way to get access to the article for free: https://join.thetimes.co.uk/?pc=regacc&ILC=INT-TNL_Header_text_181017&gotoUrl=

We have decided to release the audio recording of the interviews public to ensure that people have access to the full story. We didn't record video this time.

I agreed to the interview in the hopes of having questions about my health over the past two years addressed by a reliable media once and for all before the release of my new book Beyond Order in March. This was done partly at my publisher's request.

Mikhaila fielded the initial questions to help reduce the stress I experience in recounting the events in question. She also remembers more of what happened. She was also part of my interview at my request to ensure it didn’t continue for too long and to make sure that I didn't get excessively fatigued.

Mikhaila suggested we put my interview first as this is addressed to my audience, although my interview took place the day after hers. Her interview starts at 1:26:30.
